body.p: Cumberland County merchant and farmer. Cumberland County native. Married Mary Polly O’Banion Cloyd in 1828. Father of L. D. Cloyd, Thomas Cloyd, C. Cloyd, Sarah Cloyd, R. A. Cloyd, James Cloyd, John Cloyd, M. E. Cloyd, Missouri Cloyd, Lavega Clozy, William Cloyd. Married Victoria Williams Cloyd. Father of Eliza Cloyd, Taylor Cloyd, Lucetta Cloyd, Ritta Cloyd, Robert Cloyd. Held three slaves in 1860.
